data.text: We are honored to announce our very own Barry Northern has been awarded the ðŸŒŸ"Star of the Industry Award" from the Kentucky Travel Industry Association. Barry Northern lives and breathes Churchill Downs. He grew up around horse racing and the legendary track and uses his knowledge and love of the racetrack to turn a regular tour into a storytelling adventure for guests. Barry makes a visit to Kentucky Derby Museum the most memorable bucket-list experience for guests who come from around the globe. Barry's name is often mentioned in Trip Advisor, Yelp, and Google reviews left by guests. "I have no idea how to call a trip complete without the amazing Barry Northern who we will never forget. His heartfelt sharing of the facility, the times, what it means to people, and sharing of his own heart and mind was exceptional and memorable. Please thank him for us." Barry is an incredible ambassador for the state of Kentucky and tourism, and after ten years of service to thousands of travelers around the globe and the Kentucky Derby Museum, it is time he is recognized for his amazing storytelling and memory-making! ðŸ’™
